document_data.name: ''Aba of the Desert''
document_data.mainbody: An '''''aba of the desert''''' was a magical garment that could be found in [[Zakhara]], the Land of Fate.{{cite book/Land of Fate/Fortunes and Fates|53}}
document_data.Description: ''[[Aba]]s'' were light robes or cloaks in Zakhara.
document_data.Powers:
Wearing one of these items granted the wearer all of the effects of the ''[[cool strength]]'' spell, which was a very useful feature for the desert tribes.

The wearer could not use this item with any armor heavier than [[leather armor]].
document_data.Cultural Note: A desert tribe in possession of one of these magical garments often allowed their aged, ill, or pregnant tribe members to use them in order to ease their strains.
